article.author: Belmond
article.title: Belmond Grand Hibernian – Grand Tour of Ireland
article.lead: Brimming with all the Georgian charm of a classic Dublin saloon, the Belmond Grand Hibernian train winds through Ireland's breathtaking landscape in luxurious style.
article.body:
Depart on the Grand Tour of Ireland on Belmond Grand Hibernian and experience dramatic landscapes, regal castles and captivating towns, all whilst revelling in the elegant carriages of Ireland's only luxury sleeper train.

Allow yourself to be enchanted by the irresistible charms of the Emerald Isle. Delve into the rich history with choices of private tours and excursions. Visit Hillsborough Castle and the world famous Jameson Distillery, or watch an impressive sheepdog demonstration in Galway. Spend time exploring the riverside city of Cork and the vibrant allure of Galway.

The train’s grand interiors echo classic Georgian architecture and the ambience of a Dublin saloon. Elegant en-suite cabins have a light and airy design, enriched with the warmth of traditional tweed finishes. You’ll see our Celtic Knot symbol in all the small details. Follow it through each carriage and find yourself in the Observation Car, where large picture windows frame breath-taking views.

Thirsty for a tipple while you’re here? Our barman is on hand with a range of world-class malts and fine-wines at his fingertips. Or perhaps the evening’s entertainment calls for a Guinness while you sway to Irish folk tunes. Dining on board is a taste sensation, with our sublime menus rivalling Dublin’s top venues. Each dish celebrates Ireland’s finest local produce, served with modern flair in dining cars Wexford and Sligo. 

Each day brings new experiences for pioneering adventurers.

This unforgettable six-night journey allows each guest to experience this magical country that brims with rich heritage and lyrical spirit.

article.lead: Bringing the world closer, one vacation at a time.
article.body:

Classic Vacations packages are only available through your Travel Advisor, and they have a history of success in helping their partners plan first-rate vacations for millions of clients, just like you. Experiences you can’t find anywhere else.

They offer a full line of accommodations, from mid-tier to luxury (including suites, villas, and residences), competitive pricing, first class and private transportation options, and unique tours and excursions in Asia, Australia, Canada, Caribbean, Costa Rica, Dubai, Europe, Fiji, Hawaii, Maldives, Mexico, New Zealand, Seychelles, and Tahiti.

Every product created by Classic Vacations, every supplier they partner with, and tool they develop is with you in mind—and Travel Advisors have always relied on Classic to help create exceptional travel experiences for their clients.

The Classic Vacations product line is elaborate, but working with them is easy. Contact your travel advisor today and ask about a travel experience by Classic Vacations.

article.author: Adventures by Disney
article.title: Adventures by Disney® Provides Exclusive Sailing on AmaWaterways™
article.lead: Explore some of Europe’s most magnificent destinations as you sail along the Rhône, Seine, Rhine and Danube Rivers on an Adventures by Disney River Cruise vacation with AmaWaterways™, a leader in luxury river cruising.
article.body:
The Adventures by Disney River Cruises were designed for families. The itineraries offer a variety of experiences that parents, children and teens can enjoy—ranging from active excursions, castle and museum tours and unique onboard activities to Disney movie nights for Junior Adventurers and wine tasting for adults.

Adventures by Disney River Cruise Destinations
Choose one of our exciting Adventures by Disney River Cruises—and create unforgettable memories on your family vacation!

  • Seine River Cruise
    A 10-day/9-night, all-inclusive adventure through France
  • Rhône River Cruise
    An 8-day/7-night, all-inclusive adventure through France
  • Rhine River Cruise
    An 8-day/7-night, all-inclusive adventure to 6 destinations in 4 countries—France, Germany, Switzerland and The Netherlands
  • Danube River Cruise
    An 8-day/7-night, all-inclusive adventure to 8 destinations in 4 countries—Germany, Austria, Slovakia and Hungary

article.author: Windstar
article.title: The $250 Million Star Plus Initiative
article.lead: So Much More Than A Paint Job. This $250 Million Initiative Transforms Our Star Class Room For Stretching Out.
article.body:
“They just don’t build ships like this anymore. We are keeping the best elements and designs from these iconic vessels and re-envisioning them for the modern guest.”
— Ray Chung, Director Of Design, The Johnson Studio At Cooper Carry

WHEN OUR GUESTS TELL US they want more of what they love on Windstar, we take it as seriously as captain’s orders. That’s why we’ve embarked on a comprehensive renovation of our three all-suite Star Class ships — Star Breeze, Star Legend and Star Pride. So you get even more suites to choose from, more delight on deck, and more to explore on board.

You’ll love our beautiful new teak sundeck and iconic, cascading pool, 50 new impeccably-designed suites, gorgeous new bathrooms in all suites, and exciting menus at our new dining venues. There are also improvements behind the scenes that will help our crew serve you even better and make our Star Class ships more environmentally friendly than ever.

Like all of our small ships, our Star Class, holding only 312 guests, will continue to call at some of the world’s smallest and most interesting ports. And you’ll still enjoy the intimate environment and highly-personalized service that Windstar offers with our enviable ratio of crew to guests.

“The Initiative is not about getting bigger, it’s about offering our guests more of what they love about Windstar. Each ship will carry 312 guests total which nearly matches the capacity for Wind Surf.

The additional capacity keeps us squarely in the under 350 category. We will continue to offer the world’s best small ship experience but with more amenities that our guests have been asking us for like additional dining and an expanded spa and fitness center. We are making these improvements to ensure these beloved ships may continue to operate well into the future.”
— John Delaney, President, Windstar Cruises

NOW, YOU’LL GET EVEN MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE

  • Fifty new suites with new configurations and new 1,374 square-foot Grand Owner’s Suite
  • All existing suites will receive all-new bathrooms with new modern design touches
  • New artful and eclectic Spanish restaurant, Cuadro 44 by Anthony Sasso
  • New casual outdoor grill venue, Star Grill by Steven Raichlen
  • Expanded spa and more spacious fitness center with new motion studio
  • Beautiful new elevated pool and whirlpool
  • Expanded public spaces and open deck areas
  • New enlarged Veranda restaurant with enhanced interior seating
  • Interactive TV system in all suites with hundreds of movie choices
  • Enhanced shopping experience with high-end jewelry gallery
  • Refreshed and updated public restrooms

SOAK IT ALL IN.
While other cruise lines might use a transformation as an opportunity to add a few water slides, we chose to enhance your experience of the sea and sky with a gorgeous elevated pool and whirlpool.

We’ve expanded the sundeck so you have more room to sunbathe and relax. What’s more, you can also explore the brand new Star Grill by Steven Raichlen, or sip on a Star Bar cocktail.

RECHARGE IN OUR COMPLETELY REVAMPED SPA.
After an exhilarating day of hiking, watersports, or exploring the world’s most interesting ports like a local, you can retreat to our beautiful new spa with serene treatment rooms, fitness center, motion studio, and salon.

Want to indulge in a massage with techniques from around the world? Take an invigorating yoga class? Jump on a treadmill for a quick run with a view of the pool? Get spruced up for a night out? This is your haven on board.
